insert into FILE_DATA( FILE_NO, FILE_OWNER, FILE_SAVEPATH, FILE_SIZE, FILE_MIME, FILE_REALNAME, FILE_SAVENAME, FILE_SAVEDATE, FILE_DELYN, FILE_DOWNCOUNT, FILE_FANCYSIZE )VALUES( #{fileNo}, #{fileOwner}, #{fileSavepath}, #{fileSize}, #{fileMime}, #{fileRealname}, #{fileSavename}, sysdate, 'N', 0, #{fileFancysize} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT PT.PT_NO, PT.PT_NAME, PT.PT_BUSNUM, PT.PT_CODE, PT.PT_APPROVAL, PT.PT_OPENDATE, CDC.COMD_NAME, PT.PT_CEO, PT.PT_POSTCODE, PT.PT_ADD, PT.PT_ADD2, PT.PT_REJECT, PT.PT_MGRNAME, PT.PT_MGREMAIL, PT.PT_MGRTEL, PT.PT_ID, PT.PT_STARTDATE, PT.PT_ENDDATE, PT.PT_FILECODE, PT.PT_MONEY, PT.PT_IMAGE FROM PARTNER PT, COMMON_DETAIL_CODE CDC WHERE PT.PT_CODE = CDC.COMD_CODE AND PT.PT_NO = #{ptNo}) N LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DATA FD ON FD.FILE_OWNER = #{fileOwner}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER PT SET PT.PT_NAME = #{ptName}, PT.PT_STARTDATE = #{ptStartdate}, PT.PT_ENDDATE = #{ptEnddate}, PT.PT_OPENDATE = #{ptOpendate}, PT.PT_MONEY = #{ptMoney}, PT.PT_BUSNUM = #{ptBusnum}, PT.PT_CEO = #{ptCeo}, PT.PT_ADD = #{ptAdd}, PT.PT_ADD2 = #{ptAdd2}, PT.PT_MGRNAME = #{ptMgrname}, PT.PT_MGREMAIL = #{ptMgremail}, PT.PT_MGRTEL = #{ptMgrtel}, PT.PT_CODE = #{ptCode}, PT.PT_FILECODE = #{ptFilecode}, PT.PT_IMAGE = #{ptImage} WHERE PT.PT_NO = #{ptNo}

SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(p.PT_STARTDATE), 0) AS countMonth FROM (SELECT LEVEL AS month FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 12) m LEFT JOIN PARTNER p ON EXTRACT(MONTH FROM p.PT_STARTDATE) = m.month AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM p.PT_STARTDATE) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) GROUP BY m.month ORDER BY m.month
